chunks.zh: 各位，把拒掉的 offer 再去舔回来，可行吗？
chunks.en: Everyone, is it feasible to try and get back an offer you rejected?

chunks.zh:
30 岁，运维，去年 11 月被裁，1 月底的时候面了一个试，通过了，但是因为工资只给到 6k 给拒了，离家也远 700 公里。
本想着过完年之后再找找，现在也找了快两周了，只有一个面试，基本都是已读不回，还有几个岗位限制年龄 29 岁以内……

我现在心态崩了，不敢再拖了，想去把之前拒掉的 offer 再去舔回来，不知道可不可行……
chunks.en:
30 years old, operations and maintenance, laid off last November. I had an interview at the end of January and passed, but I rejected it because the salary was only 6k and it was 700 kilometers away from home.
I was planning to look again after the New Year, but I've been looking for almost two weeks now, and I've only had one interview. Most of them are read and ignored, and some positions restrict the age to 29 years old or younger...

I'm losing it now. I don't dare to delay any longer. I want to try and get back the offer I rejected before. I don't know if it's feasible...

chunks.zh: 6000 块钱， 还要背井离乡 700 公里， 现在工作这么难找了么！！！
chunks.en: 6000 yuan, and you have to leave your hometown 700 kilometers away, is it so difficult to find a job now!!!

chunks.zh: 限制 29 岁以内，真 tm 疯了
chunks.en: Limited to 29 years old, they're really f***ing crazy.

chunks.zh: 就为了 6k ？大可不必
chunks.en: Just for 6k? Not necessary at all.

chunks.zh: 菜市场门口理发摊：成本一把推子、一把椅子。早上 7 点到 9 点，一天理 10 个，每月干 20 天，一个月 ￥ 3000.家门口停车场夜场保安：60 岁以内，一月 3500 。小区物业保安：45 岁以内，当兵优先，身体要好  一月 5500 。说这么多，就一个疑问，700 公里，去拿 6000 ，真是的太爱这行了么？
chunks.en: Barber stall at the entrance of the farmers market: The cost is a clipper and a chair. From 7 am to 9 am, 10 haircuts a day, 20 days a month, ￥3000 a month. Night shift security guard in the parking lot at the entrance of the house: under 60 years old, 3500 a month. Property security guard in the community: under 45 years old, veterans are preferred, good health, 5500 a month. After saying so much, I have one question, 700 kilometers to get 6000, do you really love this industry so much?

chunks.zh: 29 岁以内？耗材使用年限下降？？
chunks.en: Under 29 years old? Is the service life of consumables decreasing??

chunks.zh: 6k  700 公里舔你都别去了
chunks.en: Don't even bother going for 6k and 700 kilometers.

chunks.zh: HR 随便舔(毕竟对方也只是打工的),老板就不必浪费时间
chunks.en: You can lick the HR casually (after all, they are just working), but don't waste time on the boss.

chunks.zh: 难。因为人家也知道你这是骑驴找马
chunks.en: Difficult. Because they also know that you are using this as a stepping stone.

chunks.zh: 你试试不就完了，又不会怀孕
chunks.en: Just try it, it won't get you pregnant.

chunks.zh: 6k 大可不必
chunks.en: 6k is not necessary at all.

chunks.zh: 6 千块钱还去外地 你为了什么
chunks.en: Why are you going to another place for 6,000 yuan?

chunks.zh: 为了 6K 跑这么远，真没必要
chunks.en: It's really not necessary to run so far for 6K.

chunks.zh: 不可行
chunks.en: Not feasible.

chunks.zh: 6k 背井离乡 700 公里，这比跑滴滴送外卖付出还多吧，不值
chunks.en: 6k away from your hometown 700 kilometers, this requires more effort than running Didi and delivering food, it's not worth it.

chunks.zh: 6k 真没必要舔回来
chunks.en: It's really not necessary to try and get back the 6k.

chunks.zh: 为了这个工资真没太大必要
chunks.en: It's really not that necessary for this salary.

chunks.zh: 居然这么恐怖了？
chunks.en: Is it really that scary?

chunks.zh: 16k 就舔回去  6k 你舔个啥
chunks.en: Go back for 16k, what are you licking for 6k?

chunks.zh: 6k 真没必要吧 老哥
chunks.en: 6k is really not necessary, bro.

chunks.zh: 现在干什么不比 6k 高啊 在家跑滴滴多自由
chunks.en: What can't you do now that's higher than 6k? It's much more free to run Didi at home.
